The aim study compare effect transdermal nitroglycerin ( glyceryl trinitrate , GTN ) oral nifedipine manage preterm labor . This randomized clinical trial woman admit diagnosis PTL . Our main goal delay delivery beneficial effect primary corticosteroid administration fetus .
DOC.criteria: GA 24 34 week earlyonset sign delivery ( ≥4 uterine contraction 20 minute , ≥1 centimeter ( cm ) dilation effacement 80 % ) . maternal fetal lifethreatening condition require emergency termination multiple pregnancy premature rupture membrane fatal anomaly intrauterine fetal death cervical dilation ≥4 cm tocolytic treatment previous day positive allergy GTN
